message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it's a great value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $140 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $140.  Could you do $165? I'm willing to compromise to make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
